description:
Pepe is an apprentice prostitute serving under http://anidb.net/ch91824 [Luca]. She usually assists in helping her and the other girls.
She is eventually targeted by Hunters of the Holy See while in Albion. They bind her wrists and drag her along by their horses, and when she begs them to let her go, she is whipped across the waist and face. Luckily, Pepe is saved by http://anidb.net/ch650 [Guts]` intervention.
Source: Berserk Wiki
name: Pepe
